sentence: economic growth was greatly facilitated by the emergence of civil government, which provided consistent and predictable enforcement of property rights, among other things.

sentence: uncertainties that stem from the arbitrary enforcement of the body of prevailing rules are reflected in higher risk and cost of capital which, in turn, inhibit economic growth.

sentence: over the past half century, the increase in the value of raw materials has accounted for only a fraction of the overall growth of u.s. gross domestic product.

sentence: the rest of that growth reflects the embodiment of ideas in products and services that consumers value.

label: LABEL_1
